OMAOP_IF.CPP

00001 //Filename    : OMAOP_IF.CPP
00002 //Description : Modeling_academic (Modeling_academic Operation) class
00003 // owner                        : Kevin(Ho)
00004 // Notes:       Steps to introduce a new class of user interface
00005 //                              1.      construct the new class
00006 //                              2.      in sys.h, add the new MODE, e.g. MODE_ADMISSIONS_AND_FINANCIAL_OFFICE
00007 //                              3.      include the new header file in cc.cpp, osysdisp.cpp, osysdet.cpp
00008 //                              4.      in cc.cpp, declare a global object of the new class, with the name matching the 'extern' statement in the header file
00009 //                              5.      in osysdisp.cpp, under switch(view_mode), add the redirection to the display function
00010 //                              6.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::detect_view, add the redirection to the detect function
00011 //                              7.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::process_key, add the new hot key (optional)
00012 //                              8.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::detect_button, modify if necessary (see the comments there)
00013 //                              9.      the deinit function (AdmOffice::deinit()) can be called when the view_mode in 'sys' object is switched
00014 //                                      the function frees memory occupied by this object
00015 //                                      the report function would re-allocate memory when it is called (note the init_flag)
00016 //                                      notice the beginning section of Sys::disp_frame()
00017 // Kevin 0723
00018

00177 //------- Begin of function Modeling_academic::deinit ---------------//
00179 void Modeling_academic::deinit() {
00180     //--------- deallocate memory -------------//
00181     if (*bottom_button_up_bitmap) {
00182         mem_del(maop_detail_button_up_bitmap);
00183         mem_del(maop_detail_button_down_bitmap);
00184         bottom_button_up_bitmap = NULL;
00185         bottom_button_down_bitmap = NULL;
00186     }
00187 
00188     (*deinit_func_ptr[current_mode])();
00189 
00190     init_flag = 0;
00191 }

00199

00206        //----- constants or other factors -----//

00208        maximum_debt_balance_as_a_percent_of_funds_balances = 0.5f;
00209        max_interest_payments_as_a_percent_of_operating_expenditures = 0.08f;
00210 
00211        //Construction policy parameters
00212        percent_gap_required_before_new_construction_is_considered = 0.1f;
00213 
00214        escalation_factor_for_deferrd_maintenance_per_year = 0.025f;

00217

00219

00222        maximum_debt_balance_as_a_percent_of_funds_balances
00223        * ( finance.last_year.asset_array[AC_ASSET_TOTAL] - finance.last_year.liability_array[AC_LIABILITY_TOTAL] ),
00224        finance.total_operating_expense.total *  max_interest_payments_as_a_percent_of_operating_expenditures
00225        / (finance.long_term_debt_interest / 100.0f) );
00226        err_when(total_debt_capacity[THIS_YEAR]<=0);
00227 
00228        cur_debt_limit = int(0.5f * total_debt_capacity[THIS_YEAR]);
00229 
00230        int beginCapitalReserve = int(finance.last_year.asset_array[AC_CAPITAL_RESERVE]);

00238 
00239        //BUGHERE should we do:
00240        //begin_space_inventory();
00241        //update_backlog_monthly();
00242        //run_new_construction();

00249 //------- Begin of function Modeling_academic::report ---------------//
00251 void Modeling_academic::report(int refreshFlag) {
00252     vga.use_back();
00253 
00254     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00255         //------------- paint the background ----------------//
00256         user_interface.bg_img(BG_PIC_ID, &vga_back);
00257 
00258         //----- initialize the bottom sub-menus buttons -----//
00259         if (!init_flag) {
00260             short x = BOTTOM_BUTTON_X1;
00261             for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++, x+=BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH+BOTTOM_BUTTON_DISTANCE) {
00262                 user_interface.create_button_bitmap(x, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1,
00263                                                     x+BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1+BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00264                                                     bottom_button_label[i], maop_detail_button_up_bitmap,
00265                                                     maop_detail_button_down_bitmap, &vga_back);
00266 
00267                 maop_detail_button.create_bitmapW(x, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1,
00268                                                   x+BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1+BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00269                                                   ((i == current_mode) ? bottom_button_down_bitmap : bottom_button_up_bitmap)+4);
00270             }
00271             init_flag = 1;
00272         }
00273 
00274         //----------- paint the bottom button group ---------//
00275         maop_detail_button.paint();
00276     }
00277 
00278     //---- repaint/refresh the display of the current mode ----//
00279     (*report_func_ptr[current_mode])(refreshFlag);
00280 
00281     // Comments:        blt buffer only if repaint, because the
00282     //                                  report_x functions would handle blt_buf
00283     //                                  when refresh
00284     //                                  equivalently, in the report_x functions,
00285     //                                  only blt buffer when refresh
00286 
00287     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00288         //------- blt the back buffer to front buffer -------//
00289         vga.blt_buf(ZOOM_X1, ZOOM_Y1, ZOOM_X2, ZOOM_Y2);
00290     }
00291 
00292     //##trevor 2807
00293     vga.use_front();
00294     //##trevor 2807
00295 }
00296 
00297 //---------- End of function Modeling_academic::report ------------//

00299 //-------- Begin of function Modeling_academic::detect ------------//
00303 int Modeling_academic::detect() {
00304     vga.use_back();
00305 
00306     int rc = detect2();
00307 
00308     vga.use_front();
00309 
00310     return rc;
00311 }

00315 //-------- Begin of function Modeling_academic::detect2 ------------//
00319 int Modeling_academic::detect2() {
00320     if (!init_flag)
00321         return 0;
00322 
00323     int bottomButtonGroupDetect;
00324     if ((bottomButtonGroupDetect = bottom_button_group.detect()) >= 0) {
00325         //---- deinit the modes to free memory ----//
00326         (*deinit_func_ptr[current_mode])();
00327 
00328         //-------- change display mode ------------//
00329         bottom_button_group[current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_up_bitmap[current_mode] + 4);
00330         current_mode = bottomButtonGroupDetect;
00331         bottom_button_group[current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_down_bitmap[current_mode] + 4);
00332 
00333         //-------- post display redraw flag -------//
00334         sys.redraw_all_flag = 1;
00335 
00336         return 1;
00337     }
00338 
00339     if ((*detect_func_ptr[current_mode])())
00340         return 1;
00341 
00342     return 0;
00343 }

00347 //-------- Begin of function report_DEBT ---------//
00349 static void report_debt(int refreshFlag) {
00350     // Notes:   temporary variables for debugging
00351     //                          to be interfaced with game engine
00352 
00353     static float spinnerVar1=0.0;
00354     static float spinnerVar2=0.0;
00355     static int numSeriesData = 8;                   //*** temporary ***//
00356     static int xStart = 1991, xEnd = 1998;          //*** temporary ***//
00357     static int dataArray[24];                       //*** temporary ***//
00358     //  static float dataArray[]={      25,98,75,32,65,46,38,74,
00359     //                                                                          38,75,83,79,52,36,75,83,
00360     //                                                                          79,52,36,59,23,59,23,25,
00361     //                                                                          98,75,32,65,46,38,74,38,
00362     //                                                                          75,62,83,79,52,36,59,23};
00363 
00364     //  Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
00365     xStart = info.game_year-numSeriesData+1;
00366     xEnd = info.game_year;
00367     for(int i=0;i<numSeriesData;i++) {
00368         dataArray[i]=facility_office.total_debt_capacity[i];
00369         dataArray[i+8]=facility_office.outstanding_debt_balance[i];
00370         dataArray[i+16]=facility_office.debt_limit[i];
00371     }
00372 
00373     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00374 
00375         if (mode_init_flag != MODE_DEBT) {
00376             mode_init_flag = MODE_DEBT;
00377             debt_button_up_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00378             debt_button_down_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00379             debt_button2_up_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00380             debt_button2_down_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00381 
00382             user_interface.create_button_bitmap(
00383                 DEBT_BUTTON_X1,DEBT_BUTTON_Y1,
00384                 DEBT_BUTTON_X1+DEBT_BUTTON_WIDTH,
00385                 DEBT_BUTTON_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00386                 debt_button_label[0], &debt_button_up_bitmap[0],
00387                 &debt_button_down_bitmap[0], &vga_back);
00388 
00389             user_interface.create_button_bitmap(
00390                 DEBT_BUTTON2_X1,
00391                 DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1,
00392                 DEBT_BUTTON2_X1+DEBT_BUTTON2_WIDTH,
00393                 DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON2_HEIGHT,
00394                 debt_button_label[0], &debt_button2_up_bitmap[0],
00395                 &debt_button2_down_bitmap[0], &vga_back);
00396 
00397             debt_button_group[0].create_bitmapW(DEBT_BUTTON_X1,DEBT_BUTTON_Y1,
00398                                                 DEBT_BUTTON_X1+DEBT_BUTTON_WIDTH,DEBT_BUTTON_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00399                                                 (debt_button_up_bitmap[0])+4,0);
00400 
00401             debt_button2_group[0].create_bitmapW(DEBT_BUTTON2_X1,DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1,
00402                                                  DEBT_BUTTON2_X1+DEBT_BUTTON2_WIDTH,DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON2_HEIGHT,
00403                                                  (debt_button2_up_bitmap[0])+4,0);
00404 
00405             //--------- draw the brightened boxes ------------//
00406             user_interface.rect(  REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1, REPORT_X2,
00407                                   REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB1);
00408             user_interface.rect(  REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2, REPORT_X2,
00409                                   REPORT_Y2);
00410 
00411             user_interface.brighten(
00412                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2,
00413                 REPORT_Y1,
00414                 REPORT_X2,
00415                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB1);
00416             user_interface.brighten(
00417                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2,
00418                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2,
00419                 REPORT_X2,
00420                 REPORT_Y2);
00421 
00422             debt_spinner_budget1.init(
00423                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB3+60,
00424                 REPORT_Y1+70,
00425                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB3+180,
00426                 REPORT_Y1+100 ,
00427                 &spinnerVar1,
00428                 -100.0f,100.0f,0.1f,0,NULL,23);
00429             debt_spinner_budget2.init(
00430                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB3+50,
00431                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2+70,
00432                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB3+190,
00433                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2+100,
00434                 &spinnerVar2,
00435                 -100.0f,100.0f,0.1f,0,NULL,2);
00436 
00437             //-------- graph title --------------//
00438             mode_debt_graph.init(
00439                 REPORT_X1, REPORT_Y2-MODE_DEBT_GRAPH_HEIGHT,
00440                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB1, REPORT_Y2,
00441                 3, &numSeriesData, dataArray, &xStart, &xEnd,
00442                 NULL," ", mode_debt_legend_label, 1, 1, 1, 5);
00443         }
00444         else {
00445             //--------- draw the brightened boxes ------------//
00446             user_interface.rect(  REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1, REPORT_X2,
00447                                   REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB1);
00448             user_interface.rect(  REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2, REPORT_X2,
00449                                   REPORT_Y2);
00450             user_interface.brighten(
00451                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1, REPORT_X2,
00452                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB1);
00453             user_interface.brighten(
00454                 REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2, REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2, REPORT_X2,
00455                 REPORT_Y2);
00456 
00457             //-------- paint the buttons -----------//
00458             debt_spinner_budget1.paint();
00459             debt_spinner_budget2.paint();
00460             mode_debt_graph.paint();
00461             debt_button_group[0].paint();
00462             debt_button2_group[0].paint();
00463         }
00464         //-------- display static strings -----------//
00465         font_san.put_paragraph( REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2+15, REPORT_Y1+40,
00466                                 REPORT_X2, REPORT_Y1+70,
00467                                 mode_debt_str[0]);
00468         font_san.put_paragraph( REPORT_X1+MODE_DEBT_TAB2+15, REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2+40,
00469                                 REPORT_X2, REPORT_Y1+MODE_DEBT_VTAB2+70,
00470                                 mode_debt_str[1]);
00471 
00472         //              user_interface.bar(REPORT_X1+10, REPORT_Y1+82, REPORT_X2-10, REPORT_Y1+84, V_BROWN);
00473 
00474     }
00475     else {                                          // refreshFlag == INFO_REFRESH
00476         //-------- refresh dynamic data --------------//
00477         // refresh() == 1. rest()
00478         //                                              2. draw()
00479         //                                              3. blit buffer()
00480 
00481         debt_button_group[0].paint();
00482         debt_button2_group[0].paint();
00483         debt_spinner_budget1.refresh();
00484         debt_spinner_budget2.refresh();
00485         mode_debt_graph.refresh();
00486 
00487         vga.blt_buf(DEBT_BUTTON_X1,DEBT_BUTTON_Y1,
00488                     DEBT_BUTTON_X1+DEBT_BUTTON_WIDTH,DEBT_BUTTON_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON_HEIGHT);
00489         vga.blt_buf(DEBT_BUTTON2_X1,DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1,
00490                     DEBT_BUTTON2_X1+DEBT_BUTTON2_WIDTH,DEBT_BUTTON2_Y1+DEBT_BUTTON2_HEIGHT);
00491 
00492     }
00493 
00494     debt_button_group[0].pop();
00495     debt_button_group[0].body_ptr=
00496         (void*)(debt_button_up_bitmap[0]+4);
00497     debt_button2_group[0].pop();
00498     debt_button2_group[0].body_ptr=
00499         (void*)(debt_button_up_bitmap[0]+4);
00500 }

00504 //-------- Begin of function detect_debt ---------//
00506 static int detect_debt() {
00507     if (mode_init_flag != MODE_DEBT)
00508         return 0;
00509 
00510     if (debt_spinner_budget1.detect())
00511         return 1;
00512 
00513     if (debt_spinner_budget2.detect())
00514         return 1;
00515 
00516     if(debt_button_group[0].detect()) {
00517         debt_button_group[0].body_ptr =
00518             (void *) (debt_button_down_bitmap[0] + 4);
00519         //      Communicate with Sim Engine
00520         facility_office.percent_project_funded_with_debt=(float)(*debt_spinner_budget1.var_ptr);
00521     }
00522 
00523     if(debt_button2_group[0].detect()) {
00524         debt_button2_group[0].body_ptr =
00525             (void *) (debt_button2_down_bitmap[0] + 4);
00526         //      Communicate with Sim Engine
00527         facility_office.cur_debt_limit=(int)(*debt_spinner_budget1.var_ptr);
00528     }
00529 
00530     return 0;
00531 }
00532 
00533 //---------- End of function detect_debt--//
00534 
00535 //-------- Begin of function deinit_debt ------//
00537 static void deinit_debt() {
00538     if (mode_init_flag == MODE_FINANCIAL) {
00539         // deallocate memory used by the radio buttons and the value sliders
00540 
00541         if (*debt_button_up_bitmap) {
00542             mem_del(debt_button_up_bitmap[0]);
00543             mem_del(debt_button_down_bitmap[0]);
00544             debt_button_up_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00545             debt_button_down_bitmap[0] = NULL;
00546         }
00547 
00548         debt_spinner_budget1.deinit();
00549         debt_spinner_budget2.deinit();
00550         mode_debt_graph.deinit();
00551 
00552         // reset flag
00553         mode_init_flag = -1;
00554     }
00555 }
00556 
00557 //---------- End of function deinit_debt ------//
